message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.IR. 

The paper proposes a framework for spatio-temporal action detection in videos using progressive learning. This involves refining proposals towards actions over a few steps, which suggests a focus on computer vision (cs.CV) and machine learning (cs.LG). The use of regression outputs from previous steps also indicates a focus on artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Additionally, the evaluation of the approach on video datasets suggests a focus on multimedia (cs.MM) and information retrieval (cs.IR).
